Class TestKeepLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Level
      • logic.TestKeepLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TestKeepLevel
extends Level
    Imitation of the second game level. Used for Unit testing purposes only.
